rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001
rows.name: Welcome to Sandy Bum Canyon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_1
rows.name: Aka Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_2
rows.name: Huh? "Olivia?" Friends really name it that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_3
rows.name: You know I said Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_4
rows.name: Linly, listen to Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_5
rows.name:
This place always have sandstorms.
Sands get everywhere! Therefore:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_6
rows.name: Sandy Bum Canyon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_7
rows.name: Nopon ancestors name it just fine ages ago![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_8
rows.name:
Or does Linly think she better namer
than native Miran peoples?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_9
rows.name: What? I...no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_10
rows.name:
Good. Tatsu accept Linly apology and forgive.
...This time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_12
rows.name: Strange.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
There's nothing here.
It was hard to tell the scale of it from the grainy images,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
but that ship should've at least been
big enough to spot from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0004
rows.name: Hmm... Yeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Huh? Elma, look—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0006
rows.name: Another new xeno species.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0007
rows.name: Hang on, maybe I can pick up what they're saying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0008
rows.name: Impossible! I'm telling you, just us is impossible, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Stop talking like that, would you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0010
rows.name: We have to do this, right? For everyone back on the ship![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0011
rows.name: But but but how are we supposed to destroy the turrets?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0012
rows.name: The place is likely crawling with Ganglion, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0013
rows.name: So they're not Ganglion, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0014
rows.name: Yeah. It sounded like they're fighting against them, to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Friends, friends—Tatsu knows. Those are Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0016
rows.name: Ma-non appeared on Mira maybe...year before friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0018
rows.name: I know that sound... What is it, Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0019
rows.name: Just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Tatsu, the Ganglion, and now these Ma-non...[ST:page p1=60 ]Don't you find it a little odd that
we can understand these alien languages?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0021
rows.name: Huh...good point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: xs05050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest they learned our language.

rows.label: xs05050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Hypothesize

rows.label: xs05050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest some device must be translating.

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0022
rows.name: I doubt it... Tatsu, did you study our language?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0023
rows.name: Right? Must be something like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0024
rows.name:
But we haven't been using our comm devices
when we've been talking with Tatsu...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0025
rows.name: Well, Tatsu is fluent...more or less.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0026
rows.name: Tatsu, did you study our language?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Friends' language?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0028
rows.name: ...What language are we speaking right now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0029
rows.name:
What language? Nopon, of course!
Friends' Nopon very good, by the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0030
rows.name: See?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
Xenoforms have different anatomy, physiology—
different vocal setups in general.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0032
rows.name: It seems likely they would struggle with our pronunciations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0033
rows.name: And yet, here we are, conversing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0034
rows.name:
But if they can't even produce the sounds...
this shouldn't be possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0035
rows.name: No, it shouldn't be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0036
rows.name: Unless...our words aren't being perceived as sounds at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0037
rows.name: Maybe our intent is getting across some other way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0038
rows.name: But how? ...Could it be something about this planet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0039
rows.name: Heh. Someone sounds pretty intrigued, huh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0040
rows.name: Well, what if it IS some kind of new phenomenon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0041
rows.name: Aren't you curious to learn more?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0042
rows.name: All right, now you're starting to sound just like L.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0043
rows.name: Okay, already! Friends talk less, help Ma-non more![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0044
rows.name: After all, Tatsu have reputation as heropon to uphold here! [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0045
rows.name: Suuure...right after a quick...snack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0046
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0047
rows.name:
I'm not sure how much we can help,
but we should at least make contact. Agreed?[ST:wait ]
